description: <p>Are you an experienced mental health nurse/OT/social worker who is passionate about the care of older people accessing community mental health services? </p><p>Do you want to work in a diverse multidisciplinary team that is really supportive, thinks creatively and is always looking to continue to develop to provide the best possible care to our patients and their families? </p><p>Do you want to work for a leader that shares your passion for good quality care, and will support you to be the best nurse/OT/social worker you can be?  Then, look no further.  We have just the role for you!!!</p><p>We need someone with experience in good quality mental health assessment and interventions, that can deliver these according to the values of our organisation.  You will have knowledge and experience of working with people who have organic and functional mental illness.</p><p>Your clinical competence and confidence is important to us, but in equal measure with your genuine kindness and compassion for your colleagues and patients; coupled with effective leadership skills that we will expect of you as a senior clinician.  We need someone that can support and nurture our less experienced staff, and to work effectively with the multi-disciplinary team.</p><p>In return, we will offer you a thorough induction programme, an honest and genuine commitment to map out and support your career development, as well as regular supervision and appraisal,  and 1:1 coaching with a trained coach if you would like it. We will work with you to ensure you are able to work flexibly to balance your home and work life, whilst being able to fulfil your responsibilities to the service.</p><p> </p><p> </p><p>For further details / informal visits contact:</p>NameDarelle EllwoodJob titleTeam LeaderEmail addressdarelle.ellwood@nhs.netTelephone number01732 228241
